description: React component implementing the Rides page for creating, listing, and managing ride offers and requests, including state management, API interactions, and rendering UI elements.

methods.name: reload
methods.description: Fetches latest ride metadata, offers, and requests from the API and updates the component state.

methods.name: onOfferCreated
methods.description: Handles the creation of a new ride offer, updating the offers list and displaying a toast notification.

methods.name: onRequestCreated
methods.description: Handles the creation of a new ride request, updating the requests list and displaying a toast notification.

methods.name: onCancelOffer
methods.description: Cancels an existing ride offer by calling the API, updating the offers list, and showing a notification.

methods.name: onCancelRequest
methods.description: Cancels a ride request, refreshes offers, and displays a notification.

methods.name: onConfirmRequest
methods.description: Confirms a ride request by updating the request and offers data, then displays a notification.
